 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==twist== (so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרַךְ‎</span> (= Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוֵּה‎</span>); perhaps akin to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂרג‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סרג‎</span>; Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרַךְ‎</span> is ***adhere***, compare Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***share, participate***, but <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sandal-thong***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***snare***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשָׂרֶכֶת דְּרָכֶיהָ‎</span> [[Jer.2.23|Jer 2:23]] a swift dromedary ***entangling her ways*** (galloping aimlessly; figurative).
